tier.item: (41) wiär schtää-w dsch morgän-dsch üf, um fyfi.
we stand-1PL the.GEN morning-GEN up at five
`We get up at five in the morning.'
(41) wiär schtää-w dsch morgän-dsch üf, um fyfi.
we stand-1PL the.GEN morning-GEN up at five
`We get up at five in the morning.'
wiär schtää-w dsch morgän-dsch üf, um fyfi.
we stand-1PL the.GEN morning-GEN up at five
We get up at five in the morning.
(i) a. ds morgen-tsch wen si=wer fertig gsi
the.GEN morning-GEN when are=we finished been
`In the morning, when we had finished working in the stall'
(i) a. ds morgen-tsch wen si=wer fertig gsi
the.GEN morning-GEN when are=we finished been
`In the morning, when we had finished working in the stall'
ds morgen-tsch wen si=wer fertig gsi im gadä
the.GEN morning-GEN when are=we finished been in.the stall
In the morning, when we had finished working in the stall
(44) a. tösch leiga wi ä tiful.
(44) a. tösch leiga wi ä tiful.
b. der manut wa si=wer döi gsi
the month that are=we over.there been
`During the month when we were over there'
b. der manut wa si=wer döi gsi
the month that are=we over.there been
`During the month when we were over there'
der manut wa si=wer döi gsi
the month that are=we over.there been
During the month when we were over there
(ii) gang löge wa ischt der nonno
go look where is the grandfather
(ii) gang löge wa ischt der nonno
go look where is the grandfather
gang löge wa ischt der nonno
go look where is the grandfather
Go looking where the grandfather is.
